players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie, can you tell us more about your actions last night?"
Charlie: "Bob, I'm still trying to piece together what happened last night. I didn't see or hear anything suspicious."

You: "

"
Bob: "I'll ask Charlie some more questions. Charlie, can you tell me where you were when Diana was found dead?"
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "I'm still trying to process the events of last night. I think we should focus on finding out who killed Diana."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie, can you tell us more about your actions last night?"
Charlie: "Bob, I'm still trying to piece together what happened last night. I didn't see or hear anything suspicious."

Alice: "

"
You: "I'll ask Charlie some more questions. Charlie, can you tell me where you were when Diana was found dead?"
Charlie: remained silent.
Alice: "I'm still trying to process the events of last night. I think we should focus on finding out who killed Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
